title: Average YouTube video length 2018 , by category
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The Average length in minutes of Youtube Category Music is 3.63% smaller than the maximum value at Gaming.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The Average length in minutes of Youtube Category Music is 3.63% smaller than the maximum value at Gaming.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average length in minutes for 7 number of Youtube Categorys.
Youtube Category Gaming has the highest Average length in minutes and Music has the lowest Average length in minutes.
Youtube Category Film and animation has the second highest value for Average length in minutes.
The Average length in minutes of Youtube Category Music is 3.63% smaller than the maximum value at Gaming.
Average length in minutes at Youtube Category Gaming is 24.7 , second place is Film and animation at 19.2, and thirdly is Entertainment at 12.9.
The Youtube Category Music tends to be 1.86 percent lower than average.
The Average length in minutes is 93.2 if we add up values of all Youtube Categorys.
